Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can draw two students communicating over a long distance using a string telephone.
The student can illustrate how sound travels along the string to convey information between the students.
The student can depict the problem-solving process of designing a string telephone.
The student can show the materials being used to construct the device, such as cups and string.
The student can demonstrate how the string telephone functions to solve the communication problem using sound.
The student can highlight how technological devices like a string telephone help people connect over distances.
